value.title: DAX Fridays! #7: ALL, ALLEXCEPT
value.excerpt: The function ALL returns all the rows in a table, or all the values in a column, ignoring any filters that might have been applied. value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI
